snippet: After being released from prison, Leché Cornish is taking steps to rebuild her life after years of drugs and prostitution, and the loss of her children.
abstract: Community Service Society of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides Leche Cornish of the Bronx with $112 for monthly MetroCard to get her to an internship; Cornish, after being released from prison, is taking steps to rebuild her life.
lead_paragraph: After being released from prison, Leché Cornish is taking steps to rebuild her life after years of drugs and prostitution, and the loss of her children.

headline.main: Emerging From Dark Past, and Forgiving
